mapper.insert:
SELECT NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO NOTICE(NOTICE_NO,NOTICE_TITLE,NOTICE_ABOUT, CLASSIFICATION_NO,MANAGER_NO) VALUES(#{noticeNo},#{noticeTitle},#{noticeAbout},#{classificationNo},#{managerNo})
mapper.select: SELECT N.*, C.CLASSIFICATION_NAME,M.MANAGER_NAME FROM NOTICE N JOIN CLASSIFICATIONS C ON N.CLASSIFICATION_NO = C.CLASSIFICATION_NO JOIN MANAGERS M ON M.MANAGER_NO = N.MANAGER_NO WHERE N.NOTICE_NO=#{noticeNo}
